lines.name: Roth's Reach

explicitModifiers.text: (20-80)% increased Elemental Damage with Attack Skills

lines.flavourText:
"Exiled to the sea; what a joke. 
I'm more free than I've ever been."
- Captain Weylam "Rot-tooth" Roth of the Black Crest

lines.name: The Whispering Ice

implicitModifiers.text: +(12-20)% Chance to Block Attack Damage while wielding a Staff
Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: +1 to Level of Socketed Support Gems

lines.flavourText:
Guard your darkest thoughts well, for they are
the cracks through which the Nightmare crawls.

lines.name: Earendel's Embrace

explicitModifiers.text: Summoned Skeletons Cover Enemies in Ash on Hit
Summoned Skeletons take (15-30)% of their Maximum Life per second as Fire Damage
Summoned Skeletons have Avatar of Fire

lines.flavourText:
There the weary multitude of man-kind 
shall turn in their masses into the wide fire, 
where the destroying flame embraces the living, 
some will go up, some down, filled with misery.

lines.name: Allure

implicitModifiers.text: 2% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Life

explicitModifiers.text: You gain Phasing for (3-10) seconds on using a Vaal Skill

lines.flavourText:
What drives us to kill, to carve and to shred?
What drives us to drink the seething souls of the dead?
What drives us to love and to hold, but still go amiss?
What drives us to leave this world for the Abyss?

lines.name: Ashcaller

explicitModifiers.text: (10-25)% chance to Trigger Level (8-10) Summon Raging Spirit on Kill
+(15-25)% to Fire Damage over Time Multiplier
Adds (4-24) to (7-46) Fire Damage to Spells
10% chance to Cover Enemies in Ash on Hit

lines.flavourText:
"We do not command fire.
Ngamahu lends it, and Hinekora returns it."
- Lavianga, Advisor to Kaom

lines.name: Dyadus

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (170-285) to (200-330) Fire Damage in Main Hand
Adds (170-285) to (200-330) Cold Damage in Off Hand
25% chance to Ignite when in Main Hand
100% increased Chill Duration on Enemies when in Off Hand
(40-100)% increased Damage with Ignite inflicted on Chilled Enemies
Chill Enemies for 1 second on Hit with this Weapon when in Off Hand

lines.flavourText:
Born of love, forged in blood
He burned as a torch in the blackest night
She shone as ice in the winter sun
Proudly, fiercely
At their mother's side, forever.

lines.name: Hyaon's Fury

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: (1-6)% increased Damage taken per Frenzy Charge
(12-20)% increased Lightning Damage per Frenzy Charge
+20 Life gained on Kill per Frenzy Charge

lines.flavourText:
"Hyaon the 'Red Wolf'
Howling mad
Cloaked in blood
A banner to his legion
A terror to his foes."
- Garivaldi, Chronicler to the Empire

lines.name: Kaom's Primacy

explicitModifiers.text: Gain 1 Rage on Critical Hit with attacks, no more than once every 0.5 seconds
Gain 1 Rage on Critical Strike with Attacks
Gain 1% of Physical Damage as Extra Fire Damage per 1 Rage
Every Rage also grants 1% of Physical Damage as Extra Fire Damage

lines.flavourText:
One by one, Kaom slaughtered the weakest tribe
leaders until the others leapt to join his cause.

lines.name: Kondo's Pride

explicitModifiers.text: 0.6% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Life
50% increased Melee Damage against Bleeding Enemies
Cannot Leech Life from Critical Strikes
30% chance to Blind Enemies on Critical Strike
50% chance to cause Bleeding on Critical Strike

lines.flavourText:
Faintly gleaming in the moonlit night,
Kondo's Pride was primed to fight.
Driven by an inner fire,
bloodlust, spite and ill desire.
He swiftly moved to strike them all,
wreaking havoc like a steel squall.

lines.name: Kongor's Undying Rage

explicitModifiers.text: Your Critical Strikes do not deal extra Damage
You gain Onslaught for (2-4) seconds on Critical Strike

lines.flavourText: Command like a king and nothing will stand in your way.

lines.name: Last Resort

implicitModifiers.text: +3 Life gained for each Enemy hit by Attacks
Gain 3 Life per Enemy Hit by Attacks

explicitModifiers.text: 25% increased Attack Speed when on Low Life
100% increased Claw Physical Damage when on Low Life
100% increased Accuracy Rating when on Low Life

lines.flavourText: Desperate times demand desperate measures.

lines.name: Midnight Bargain

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: Cannot be used with Chaos Inoculation
+1 to maximum number of Raised Zombies

lines.flavourText:
A chilling hush, a scraping sound
Of things no more entombed in ground.
A shambling horde is on its way
To crush the very light of day.

lines.name: Mon'tregul's Grasp

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: 50% reduced maximum number of Raised Zombies
Raised Zombies have +(500-5000) to maximum Life
Raised Zombies have +(25-30)% to all Resistances
Enemies killed by Zombies explode dealing 20% of their Maximum Life as Fire Damage
Enemies Killed by Zombies' Hits Explode, dealing (20-50)% of their Life as Fire Damage
Raised Zombies deal (80-125)% more Physical Damage

lines.flavourText: With death as my ally, all the world is within my grasp.

lines.name: Null's Inclination

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: Trigger Socketed Minion Spells on Kill with this Weapon

Trigger Socketed Minion Spells on Kill with this Weapon
Minion Spells Triggered by this Item have a 0.25 second Cooldown with 5 Uses
Minions deal 1% increased Damage per (5-10) Dexterity

lines.flavourText: The hunt continues when the prey falls.

lines.name: Nycta's Lantern

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: +2 to Level of Socketed Fire Gems
Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 10 Added Fire Damage
Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 10 Cold to Fire
Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 10 Fire Penetration
Socketed Gems deal 63 to 94 additional Fire Damage
Socketed Gems deal 63 to 94 Added Fire Damage
+(6-10) Life gained for each Enemy hit by Attacks
Gain (6-10) Life per Enemy Hit by Attacks

lines.flavourText:
Left in her tomb by the lynch mob, 
the flame inside still blazed bright after her death, 
and so did hers.

lines.name: Piscator's Vigil

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: Attacks with this Weapon have (100-115)% increased Elemental Damage
Damage with Weapons Penetrates 5% Elemental Resistance
Damage with Weapons Penetrates 5% Elemental Resistances

lines.flavourText:
"Stone still, amidst the reeds,
breath fogging in the iron cold air. 
he sits, he waits, he watches. 
A piscatorial vigil, sat by the river, 
his cathedral, his patience his unanswered prayer."
- Jojoba Mansell, bard, angler, adventurer

lines.name: Quill Rain

explicitModifiers.text: +2 Mana gained for each Enemy hit by Attacks
Gain 2 Mana per Enemy Hit with Attacks

lines.flavourText:
"The rain of a thousand quills that whittle
present into past, life into death."
- Rigwald of the Ezomytes

lines.name: Scaeva

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: 0.3% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Life per Red Socket
+10% to Global Critical Strike Multiplier per Green Socket
0.3% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Mana per Blue Socket
8% increased Global Defences per White Socket
(60-80)% increased Global Critical Strike Chance when in Main Hand
+8% Chance to Block Attack Damage when in Off Hand

lines.flavourText:
Even from the back rows,
the whistling steel was mesmerising.
They watched the dance in the arena dust, silent as the dead.
A spell only broken by the spilling of blood.

lines.name: Twyzel

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems fire an additional Projectile

lines.flavourText:
Life persisted,
hardened, twisted.

lines.name: Debeon's Dirge

explicitModifiers.text: 15% increased Movement Speed if you've Warcried Recently
15% increased Movement Speed if you've used a Warcry Recently
150% increased Elemental Damage if you've Warcried Recently
150% increased Elemental Damage if you've used a Warcry Recently
Warcries Knock Back and Interrupt Enemies in a smaller Area
Warcries Knock Enemies Back in an Area

lines.flavourText:
A sharp and heavy beat,
discorded, out of tune,
when you hear it on the wind,
you know death will follow soon.

lines.name: Cane of Unravelling

implicitModifiers.text: +(18-25)% Chance to Block Attack Damage while wielding a Staff

explicitModifiers.text: +(40-57)% to Chaos Damage over Time Multiplier
2% increased Cast Speed per Power Charge
+2 to Level of all Chaos Spell Skill Gems
Gain a Power Charge after Spending a total of 200 Mana
Regenerate 2 Mana per Second per Power Charge

lines.flavourText:
"Creation is the act of making the intangible tangible.
To work backwards, to make the tangible intangible,
is to step into the mind of a god."
- Doryani, Queen's Thaumaturgist

lines.name: Balefire

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

lines.flavourText:
After the fires swept down from the sky and swallowed the city,
all that lingered, as if locked in time,
was a memory of that which was gone, a whisper of deeds undone.

lines.name: Ahn's Might

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: +50% Global Critical Strike Multiplier while you have no Frenzy Charges
+(400-500) to Accuracy Rating while at Maximum Frenzy Charges

lines.flavourText:
"Impossibly heavy, yet the ancient edge is as keen as any modern blade's.
A reminder that, in the end, when we lie in the bellies of worms,
it is what we make that makes us."
- Icius Perandus, Antiquities Collection, Item 47

lines.name: Wings of Entropy

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: +(8-12)% Chance to Block Attack Damage while Dual Wielding
Adds (75-100) to (165-200) Fire Damage in Main Hand
Adds (75-100) to (165-200) Chaos Damage in Off Hand

lines.flavourText: Fire and Anarchy are the most reliable agents of change.

lines.name: Xoph's Inception

explicitModifiers.text: Gain (200-300) Life per Ignited Enemy Killed
Gain 20% of Physical Damage as Extra Fire Damage
Arrows deal 30 to 50 Added Fire Damage for each time they've Pierced

lines.flavourText:
Upon the red pyre we are born.

<default>{This item can be transformed with a Blessing of Xoph}

lines.name: Queen's Decree

explicitModifiers.text: +1 to maximum number of Raised Zombies

lines.flavourText:
The nobles wanted to take her throne.
She let the peasants take their wealth.
The peasants wanted to take her wealth.
She let the soldiers take their heads.
The soldiers wanted to take her head.
She sat on her throne and wept.

lines.name: Ewar's Mirage

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: Attacks Chain an additional time when in Main Hand
Attacks fire an additional Projectile when in Off Hand
(40-55)% increased Elemental Damage with Attack Skills

lines.flavourText:
A single breeze blows
A hundred blades dance

lines.name: Jack, the Axe

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: Grants Level 20 Thirst for Blood Skill
2% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Life
+(25-35)% to Damage over Time Multiplier for Bleeding from Hits with this Weapon
50% reduced total Recovery per second from Life Leech
50% reduced Recovery per second from Life Leech
25% chance to cause Bleeding on Hit

lines.flavourText: "More blood... hack open flesh... must drink..."

lines.name: Storm Cloud
lines.flavourText:
Centuries of development in steel armoursmithing
turned the armies of the Eternal Empire
into very effective lightning rods.

lines.name: Death's Hand

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: 30% chance to gain a Power Charge when you Stun
Gain Unholy Might for 4 seconds on Critical Strike

lines.flavourText:
"All are welcome in Hinekora's eternal home." 
- Karui Proverb

lines.name: Advancing Fortress

implicitModifiers.text: +(21-44) Life gained for each Enemy hit by Attacks
Gain (21-44) Life per Enemy Hit by Attacks
Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 12 Fortify
Reflects (71-90) Physical Damage to Melee Attackers

lines.flavourText:
"A man cowers behind his walls.
A woman carries her fortress with her.
In heart, in mind, in hand."
- Sekhema Deshret

lines.name: Goblinedge

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: (20-25)% increased Attack Speed if you haven't gained a Frenzy Charge Recently
(60-80)% increased Critical Strike Chance if you haven't gained a Power Charge Recently
+3 seconds to Duration of Frenzy and Power Charges on Culling Strike

lines.flavourText:
"That bronze girl sure knows how to cut someone down to size!"
- Bertrand the Plush

lines.name: Mark of the Doubting Knight

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: +5% Chance to Block Attack Damage while Dual Wielding
(25-50)% chance to Cause Bleeding on Critical Strike
(25-50)% chance to Cause Poison on Critical Strike

lines.flavourText:
Nothing is pure.
Slice open the Innocent
And spill a thousand Sins.

lines.name: White Wind

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: (15-25)% chance to Dodge Attack Hits while your Off Hand is empty
(100-200)% increased Cold Damage while your Off Hand is empty
+(15-40)% chance to Suppress Spell Damage while your Off Hand is empty

lines.flavourText:
The Maraketh fear very little, 
but they dare not whisper the name
of the demon that flies on Winter's gales.

lines.name: Infractem

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

lines.flavourText:
Mark us with mercy, then press on with care,
Execute us steadily, notch away at our despair.

lines.name: Nuro's Harp

explicitModifiers.text: 15% chance to create Chilled Ground when you Freeze an Enemy
Create Consecrated Ground when you Shatter an Enemy

lines.flavourText:
Night's frost becomes morning's dew
Darkness cleansed, pure and new.

lines.name: Axiom Perpetuum

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (2-3) to (5-6) Fire Damage to Spells
Adds (2-3) to (5-6) Cold Damage to Spells
Adds 1 to (10-12) Lightning Damage to Spells
(100-140)% increased Critical Strike Chance for Spells

lines.flavourText: The worst of Axiom were imprisoned by more than iron.

lines.name: Callinellus Malleus

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: (15-25)% reduced Enemy Stun Threshold with this Weapon
All Attack Damage Chills when you Stun

lines.flavourText:
To neither ebb nor flow,
but weather the rising tide,
outlast, unshifting and unshifted,
until the waters recede and we stand together.

lines.name: Cameria's Maul

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: 40% increased Rarity of Items Dropped by Frozen Enemies
(30-40)% increased Cold Damage with Attack Skills

lines.flavourText:
"You'll have my riches when you pry them
from my cold, dead hands!"
"That's how I prefer it."

lines.name: Innsbury Edge

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: 0.2% of Chaos Damage Leeched as Life
25% of Physical Damage Converted to Chaos Damage
Attacks with this Weapon Maim on hit

lines.flavourText:
A sword he brought, his foes to maim and rend,
from places dark behind forbidden doors,
but night by night he woke with frighten'd roars
from ghoulish dreams, too strange to comprehend.

lines.name: Relentless Fury

explicitModifiers.text: (0.6-2)% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Life
You gain Onslaught for 3 seconds on Culling Strike
100% chance to Avoid being Chilled during Onslaught

lines.flavourText:
Relentless fury
Sunder my every foe
Fuel my boiling blood

implicitModifiers.text: +(12-20)% Chance to Block Attack Damage while wielding a Staff
+20% Chance to Block Spell Damage while wielding a Staff

lines.flavourText: Touch not the thorn, for only blood and pain await.

lines.flavourText: Death is but the start of your servitude.

0.5% of Attack Damage Leeched as Life against Maimed Enemies

lines.flavourText: Some things must die so that others can live.

explicitModifiers.text: Gain (13-40)% of Physical Damage as Extra Chaos Damage
Enemies you Kill have a 20% chance to Explode, dealing a quarter of their maximum Life as Chaos Damage

lines.flavourText:
We forge order from the world around us
Wielding anarchy and destruction as our tools of genesis.

implicitModifiers.text: +(15-25) Life gained for each Enemy hit by Attacks

lines.flavourText:
Tread lightly, lest their vigil find you.
Speak softly, lest their reason fend you.
Cut gently, lest their spirit haunt you.

lines.flavourText:
"When the hyena howls thrice
death is sure to follow."
-Maraketh Wisdom

lines.name: Bloodplay

explicitModifiers.text: (10-30)% chance to cause Bleeding on Hit

lines.flavourText:
"I'm a painter, and crimson is my chosen hue."
- Coralito, Brotherhood of Silence

lines.name: Chin Sol

implicitModifiers.text: (6-24)% increased Elemental Damage with Attack Skills
Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: (50-100)% More Damage with Arrow Hits at Close Range

lines.flavourText:
As a soldier you want to get close to enemy archers.
That is not the case when fighting the Maraketh.

lines.name: Chober Chaber

explicitModifiers.text: +1 to Level of Socketed Melee Gems
+1 to Level of Socketed Minion Gems

lines.flavourText: The faithful may continue to serve, even after death.

explicitModifiers.text: Grants Level 12 Summon Stone Golem Skill

Minions deal (5-8) to (12-16) additional Attack Physical Damage

lines.flavourText:
There is nothing, flesh, spirit, or stone
Free from our hunger for dominion.

lines.name: Daresso's Passion

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: 25% chance to gain a Frenzy Charge on Kill
(60-80)% increased Damage while you have no Frenzy Charges

lines.flavourText:
It doesn't matter how well the young swordsman trains.
All form and finesse are forgotten when blood first hits the ground.

lines.name: Death's Harp

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: Bow Attacks fire an additional Arrow

lines.flavourText:
The mournful music of the strings,
The creaking arch, the arrow sings.
A choking cry, a rattled breath,
The Reaper's Song, the Harp of Death.

lines.name: Dreadarc

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: Curse Enemies with Level 10 Flammability on Hit
Curse Enemies with Flammability on Hit
Curse Enemies with Flammability on Hit, with 40% increased Effect

lines.flavourText:
The fastest way to a man's heart
is through his sternum.

lines.flavourText:
Soon, the pleas for mercy were muted.
Only one voice remained.
Laughing.

lines.name: Ephemeral Edge

lines.flavourText:
In the rift between future and past,
life passes quickly.

lines.name: Fidelitas' Spike

explicitModifiers.text: +2 Life gained for each Enemy hit by Attacks
Gain 2 Life per Enemy Hit by Attacks
Herald of Thunder has 50% increased Buff Effect

lines.flavourText:
Maligaro was transformed by Raulo's love.
Thaumaturgy allowed Maligaro to return the favour.

lines.name: Geofri's Baptism
lines.flavourText:
"One quick tap is all the persuasion you'll need."
- Archbishop Geofri of Phrecia Cathedral

lines.name: Gorebreaker
lines.flavourText:
Sure, there's many a hard man out there.
But this'll soften them up.

lines.name: Heartbreaker

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: (10-80)% faster start of Energy Shield Recharge

lines.flavourText:
A heart can be stabbed by thoughts, 
If your mind is sharp enough.

lines.name: Hrimnor's Hymn

explicitModifiers.text: 1% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Life

lines.flavourText:
"The crack of bone, the spray of blood.
Is there sweeter music?"
- Hrimnor of the Ezomytes.

lines.flavourText:
The Eternals commanded an army that need not eat, sleep, or breathe
without the usual depravities of necromancy.

lines.name: Lakishu's Blade

"May the Blessed Lakishu watch our backs and our wives."

lines.flavourText:
Swinging through the air, it sings
of sundered, severed, missing things.

lines.flavourText:
Beneath the cold light of the moon,
the wing moves faster than the eye.

lines.flavourText:
Give yourself to the flames and your name
will burn in the minds of men forever.

lines.flavourText:
"A raging Solaris seared and contorted the orb's surface. 
A despairing Lunaris filled the scars with her tears. 
Yet Viridi remained, trapped within, forever more."
 - Azmerian Creation Myth

lines.name: Rigwald's Charge

lines.flavourText:
"Today, clansmen, my sword is my voice!"
- Rigwald, at the Battle of Glarryn

lines.name: Silverbranch

explicitModifiers.text: +(1-2) to Level of Socketed Bow Gems

lines.flavourText:
"The wild takes care of its own."
- Hyrri of the Karui

In time, all becomes nothing.
We just expedite the process.

lines.flavourText: That which was broken may yet break.

lines.flavourText:
You can never truly tame the tempest.
You can barely even leash it.

lines.flavourText:
Take your partners by the hand,
Keep your steps in time.
Swing together, spin apart,
And dance with death sublime.

lines.name: The Screaming Eagle

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are supported by Level 2 Chance to Flee

lines.flavourText:
The eagle knows nothing
but the scream and the strike.

lines.name: The Stormheart

implicitModifiers.text: +20% Chance to Block Spell Damage while wielding a Staff
+(12-18)% Chance to Block Attack Damage while wielding a Staff

explicitModifiers.text: You cannot be Shocked while Frozen
100% chance to Avoid being Shocked while Chilled

lines.flavourText:
When the storm comes,
the safest place to be is the centre.

lines.name: Touch of Anguish

implicitModifiers.text: +(25-46) Life gained for each Enemy hit by Attacks
Gain (25-46) Life per Enemy Hit by Attacks

explicitModifiers.text: 20% chance to gain a Frenzy Charge on Killing a Frozen Enemy
Skills Chain an additional time while at maximum Frenzy Charges
Critical Strikes do not inherently Freeze

lines.flavourText:
Grip the frozen steel, feel it numb you.
Wield the cold touch of death like 
a splinter of your own shattered heart.

lines.name: Widowmaker

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: 100% increased Critical Strike Chance against Enemies that are on Full Life
100% increased Critical Strike Chance against Enemies on Full Life
1% of Attack Damage Leeched as Life on Critical Strike

lines.flavourText:
Love only death
For she shall never let you go.

lines.name: Wildslash

implicitModifiers.text: Gain (5-7) Life per Enemy Hit by Attacks
+(5-7) Life gained for each Enemy hit by Attacks

explicitModifiers.text: 15% increased Attack Speed with Movement Skills

lines.flavourText:
There are two things to know about fighting:
When to swing like crazy, and when to run.

lines.flavourText: Fire and Anarchy are the most reliable agents of change.

lines.flavourText:
To discover how cruel nature can be,
you need only shake the wrong branch.

lines.name: Ashcaller

lines.flavourText:
"We do not command fire.
Ngamahu lends it, and Hinekora returns it."
- Lavianga, Advisor to Kaom
